contentrichtext.text: {{for|things named New World|New World (disambiguation)}} '''New Worlds''' can refer to: == In publishing == * [[New Worlds (magazine)]], a British science fiction magazine * [[New Worlds (Marvel Comics)]], a X-Men storyline written by Grant Morrison. * New Worlds, an imprint of [[Caliber Comics]]. == In music, film and television == * ''New Worlds'', a song on the [[BBC Radiophonic Music]] compilation. * ''The New Worlds Fair'', an album by "[[Michael Moorcock]] and the Deep Fix". * [[New Worlds (album)]], the third solo album by ex-[[Ash (band)|Ash]] guitarist, [[Charlotte Hatherley]]. == Other == * [[Star Trek: New Worlds]], a Star Trek strategy game. * [[New Worlds Mission]], a NASA funded project. * [[New Worlds Project]], a non-profit corporation and a web-based creative writing project. {{disambig}}
